name: Offroad 4x4 Dirt Track Racing & Hill Driving
name_original: Offroad 4x4 Dirt Track Racing & Hill Driving
description:
Push start your mountain 4x4 vehicles and blaze on offroad adventurous tracks. Whether it's a metalled road, dirt track or the slippery snowy road, you need to showcase your skills on offroad tracks & hilly areas. Go crazy by racing, jumping & drifting through uphill turns. It is non-stop fun because every level requires challenging skills.

It’s not just about simple driving. Controlling the powerful vehicles on the hills & slippery roads is the secret recipe that will bring you glory. Complete all the difficult challenges with different vehicles in realistic environments.

Let’s go for a ride!
